title: Assessing The State Of Human Rights In Iran
teaser: Six Iranians were arrested for a video they posted to YouTube of dancing to the hit song, "Happy." It is the latest sign of the power struggle between the hardliners in the government and the President Hassan Rouhani. NPR's Arun Rath speaks with Hadi Ghaemi, executive director of the International Campaign for Human Rights in Iran.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
